channel.title: Client help
channel.description:
I updated to JDK 6 Update 13. A.K.A. the lastest Java
And when I run a 508 client i get a error in the console saying
Error occurred during initialization of VM java/lang/NoClassDefFoundError: java/lang/Object Press any key to continue...
What does this mean?

item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @_ara72421 §ara72421
item.description:
@_ara72421 wrote:

Its the client not the server. Im trying to get on someone elses server.

Read full topic

item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Just lower the number which comes after ‘-Xmx’ in your batch file which runs the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Edit the batch file and delete -Xmx1000m (1000 can be any number).

Then I would suggest compling again since the class “Object” is missing. If compiling does not help download the server again.

Read full topic
